Package net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.locale

Provides an internationalization framework for MIWT.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LocaleProvider
    Provides Locales.
    LocaleProvider.LocaleRenderer
    Renderer for Locales returned by LocaleProvider.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CountryInformationRenderer
    Renderer for country information.
    JDBCLocaleSourceTestManual
    Manual tests for jdbc locale source.
    LocalizationRenderer
    Component that renders a LocalizedObjectKey.
    LocalizedObjectKeyFieldComponent
    Field component for LocalizedObject keys for LocalizedText.
    LocalizedObjectKeyTextAreaComponent
    TextArea component for LocalizedObject keys for LocalizedText.
    RequiredLocalizationValidator
    Validator for LocalizedObjectKeyFieldComponent that requires at least one localization with content.
    TransformedLocalizedText
    Allows the value of a LocalizedText object to be transformed in some manner.
    TrimmedLocalizedText
    Trims whitespace from localized text.
    TruncatingLocalizedText
    A LocalizedText subclass that truncates the text if it is over a certain length.

Package net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.locale Description

Provides an internationalization framework for MIWT. Each object that may be localized must extend from LocalizedObject. These objects are registered with a LocaleContext that will update the objects when the locale is changed.
